text: Shefali Chowdhury (born 20 June 1988) is a Welsh actress. She played Parvati Patil in the Harry Potter movie series, except for Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (2004). Chowdhury was born in Denbigh, Denbighshire, Wales. Her parents were from Bangladesh. Chowdhury's career began in 2005. ==References== ==Other websites== * * I Am The Doorway Rowney Brothers Site Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh television actors
title: Shefali Chowdhury
